name: Magic Clay
description:
Bienvenidos al mundo de la plástilina, aquí es todo luz y color, inocencia y mocos.¿ Podrás escapar al castillo antes de que vuelvan los niños del recreo?

ENGLISH: Welcome to clay world. Here is all light and color, innocence and snots. Could you scape to the castle before the children get back from playtime?

Developed by FatalFemaleVideogameFactory - Female Ludum Dare Team
